title: Home

There are 27321 in the NCBI.





Currently the website is manually updated each month. Statistics and plots are created using the monthly published INPHARED dataset.

title: Jumbo Phages
text:
Jumbophage genomes
Jumbo phage genomes are around 200kb and currently there are


Show the code
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)

plot <- read_tsv("rawdata/clean_genomes_data.tsv") %>%
    select(jumbophage) %>%
    count(jumbophage) %>%
    mutate(jumbophage = if_else(jumbophage == FALSE, "No Jumbo Phage",
        "Jumbo Phage"
    )) %>%
    ggplot(aes(
        x = jumbophage,
        y = n
    )) +
    geom_col() +
    scale_y_continuous(
        expand = c(0, 0),
        limits = c(0, 30000),
        breaks = seq(0, 300000, 3000)
    ) +
    labs(
        x = NULL,
        y = "Number of phages"
    ) +
    theme(
        text = element_text(size = 15, family = "Cabin Sketch"),
        panel.background = element_blank(),
        panel.border = element_rect(colour = "black", fill = NA, linewidth = 2)
    )

ggplotly(plot)
